chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 Pro has this issue. Thank you for the help,

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile 

Please, don't refund the order. The customer wants to keep it finally.

Regards,
Mirana from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have updated our logistics partner and will update you accordingly regarding the new tracking link.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

Thanks a lot.
We're waiting for you informations about the tracking link in this case.

Regards,
Mirana from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We extend our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused. It has come to our attention that the parcel may have been stolen. We take such incidents very seriously and have launched an extensive internal inquiry to ascertain the circumstances surrounding this unfortunate event. As a gesture of our commitment to customer satisfaction and to alleviate any inconvenience caused, we have promptly refunded the customer in full for their order.

Regards,
JY
